text: læa khea klaw wa “xo luk xey! Phwk cea xya khea meuxng thang deiywkan tæ phwk cea cng khea meuxng tang thang kan læa chan mi xac hı khwam khumkan phwk cea ca kxallxh di kar tadsin pen siththi khx ngxallxh chan khxm xb kar wicı dæ phraxngkh læa khx hı brrda phu mxb kar wicı cng wicı dæ phraxngkh”
